page.title: 07A 12 Year Old Girl's Day
page.content:
We are on second sitting for lunch and I have two potatoes and some mince and an apple which I finish rather quickly. At break I fool around by the tennis courts. Next we have PE lesson. It is tennis. I am partners with Charlotte but I keep hitting the ball too high. Next we have RS with Mrs Gay (Christian Aid) today. Then we have History which I like. We have a quiz and the two sides draw. Afterwards we have hymn practice. We sing and sing until the last bell goes at 4.10 and then we go home to homework and tea.
{Rebecca Collins.
